author: Matthew Cappucci, Andrew Freedman, Jason Samenow
title: Violent storms, tornadoes shift to East Coast after leaving at least 19 dead, 1.3 million without power in South
description: Tornado watches stretch from north Florida to southeast Virginia while the Northeast braces for widespread strong winds.
content: At least 19 people were killed and dozens were injured after a swarm of destructive tornadoes and damaging winds tore across the South on Easter Sunday. Violent storms brought more than 400 reports of severe weather, including 360 reports of wind damage and d… [+10984 chars]
